text: George O'Hanlon (November 23, 1912 â€“ February 11, 1989) was an American movie and voice actor, comedian and TV writer. He was known for his roles in the Warner Bros.' live-action Joe McDoakes short subjects from 1942 to 1956 and as the voice of George Jetson in Hanna-Barbera's 1962 prime-time animated television series The Jetsons and its 1985 revival. He was born in Brooklyn, New York on November 23 1912 and died from a stroke at age 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1912 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Writers from New York City
title: George O'Hanlon
